title-group.article-title: A Behavioral Science Approach to Financial Research

abstract.p: In terms of practical usefulness, the output of traditional research based on modeling the market is not impressive enough to warrant exclusive concentration on this type of research methodology. Yet there is little interest in the development of new methodologies to deal with research in finance. This paper considers the use of a behavioral science methodology as an additional means of enabling financial researchers to investigate valuation phenomena.
